DE.name: Mega Man™ X3
DE.description: Gerade als es so aussah, als ob ein Heilmittel für die Reploiden gefunden worden wäre, verwandeln sich die einst friedlichen Roboter erneut in bösartige Mavericks. Mega Man X und Zero, die Maverick-Jäger, treten erneut auf den Plan. Mega Man X3 ist das letzte Kapitel der Serie für Super Nintendo. Spiele als Mega Man X oder, zum ersten Mal, auch als Zero, der über noch mächtigere Waffen verfügt. Zusätzlich zum klassischen Gameplay kannst du Rüstungen und Verbesserungschips sammeln, die deine Fähigkeiten noch weiter steigern. Bist du gut genug, um dich diesem neuesten Ausbruch zu stellen? Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

BE.name: Mega Man™ X3
BE.description: Au moment où un antidote semblait avoir été découvert pour les Réploïdes, ces robots, autrefois pacifiques, s'allièrent aux terribles rebelles. C'est aux chasseurs de rebelles, Mega Man X et Zero, d'entrer en action. Mega Man X3 est le dernier chapitre de la série sur Super Nintendo. Incarnez Mega Man X ou, pour la première fois, Zero, le commandant doté d'armes encore plus puissantes. Dans ce run and gun classique, ramassez les armures et les capsules d'amélioration pour perfectionner vos capacités au maximum. Serez-vous à la hauteur ? Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

CZ.name: Mega Man™ X3
CZ.description: Just when it seemed like a cure for the Reploids had been found, suddenly the once-peaceful robots are turning back into rogue Mavericks. As Maverick Hunters, Mega Man X and Zero spring into action. Mega Man X3 is the final chapter of the series on Super Nintendo. Play as Mega Man X or, for the first time, as Zero who has even more powerful weaponry. In addition to the classic run-and-gun gameplay, collect armour and new Enhancement Chips to upgrade your abilities further. Do you have the skills to fight this latest outbreak? This is the US version of the game.

DK.name: Mega Man™ X3
DK.description: Just when it seemed like a cure for the Reploids had been found, suddenly the once-peaceful robots are turning back into rogue Mavericks. As Maverick Hunters, Mega Man X and Zero spring into action. Mega Man X3 is the final chapter of the series on Super Nintendo. Play as Mega Man X or, for the first time, as Zero who has even more powerful weaponry. In addition to the classic run-and-gun gameplay, collect armour and new Enhancement Chips to upgrade your abilities further. Do you have the skills to fight this latest outbreak? This is the US version of the game.

CA.name: MEGA MAN X3
CA.description: After discovering a virus that is turning intelligent and peaceful robots known as Reploids into rogue Mavericks, the scientist Dr. Doppler successfully creates an antivirus to the phenomenon. The reformed Reploids then move into Dopple Town, a place where humans and Reploids can live together in harmony. But when an outbreak occurs causing the Reploids to turn back into Mavericks, Maverick Hunters Mega Man X and Zero are sent to contain the situation. Choose either Mega Man X or Zero as you run, jump, dash, scale walls, avoid obstacles, and fight enemies in eight challenging stages. At the end of each stage, defeat the boss to gain a special weapon that will aid you in the upcoming battles. Will you be the cure for this latest outbreak?

AU.name: Mega Man™ X3
AU.description: Just when it seemed like a cure for the Reploids had been found, suddenly the once-peaceful robots are turning back into rogue Mavericks. As Maverick Hunters, Mega Man X and Zero spring into action. Mega Man X3 is the final chapter of the series on Super Nintendo. Play as Mega Man X or, for the first time, as Zero who has even more powerful weaponry. In addition to the classic run-and-gun gameplay, collect armour and new Enhancement Chips to upgrade your abilities further. Do you have the skills to fight this latest outbreak? This is the US version of the game.

BR.name: MEGA MAN X3
BR.description: Após descobrir um vírus que estava transformando os Reploids, robôs inteligentes e pacíficos, em trapaceiros Mavericks, o cientista Dr. Doppler criou com sucesso um antivírus para combater o fenômeno. Os Reploids reabilitados foram levados de volta para Dopple Town, um lugar onde humanos e Reploids convivem em harmonia. Mas quando um surto faz com que os Reploids se transformem em Mavericks novamente, os caçadores de Mavericks, Mega Man X e Zero, são mandados para conter a situação. Escolha entre Mega Man X e Zero ao correr, pular, quebrar, escalar paredes, evitar obstáculos e lutar contra inimigos em 8 fases desafiadoras. Derrote o chefão no final de cada estágio para ganhar uma arma especial que irá ajudá-lo nas batalhas que estão por vir. Será que você vai ser a cura para este último surto do vírus? Choose either Mega Man X or Zero as you run, jump, dash, scale walls, avoid obstacles, and fight enemies in eight challenging stages. At the end of each stage, defeat the boss to gain a special weapon that will aid you in the upcoming battles. Will you be the cure for this latest outbreak?

EE.name: Mega Man™ X3
EE.description: Just when it seemed like a cure for the Reploids had been found, suddenly the once-peaceful robots are turning back into rogue Mavericks. As Maverick Hunters, Mega Man X and Zero spring into action. Mega Man X3 is the final chapter of the series on Super Nintendo. Play as Mega Man X or, for the first time, as Zero who has even more powerful weaponry. In addition to the classic run-and-gun gameplay, collect armour and new Enhancement Chips to upgrade your abilities further. Do you have the skills to fight this latest outbreak? This is the US version of the game.

ES.name: Mega Man™ X3
ES.description: Justo cuando parecía que se había encontrado una cura para los reploides, estos empiezan a convertirse en malvados robots rebeldes. ¡Es hora de que Mega Man X y Zero, miembros de los Cazadores de Robots Rebeldes, entren en acción! Mega Man X3 es el último capítulo de la saga para Super Nintendo e introduce la posibilidad de controlar a Zero, quien dispone de más armas potentes, además de a Mega Man X. Salta y dispara, recoge piezas de armadura y mejora tus habilidades. ¿Podrás poner fin a esta nueva amenaza? Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

NL.name: Mega Man™ X3
NL.description: Op het moment dat schijnbaar een remedie voor de Reploids werd gevonden, veranderden de ooit vreedzame robots in kwaadaardige Mavericks. Mega Man X en Zero komen in actie. Mega Man X3 is het laatste deel in de Super Nintendo-reeks. Speel als Mega Man X of – voor het eerst in de reeks – Zero die krachtiger is dan ooit tevoren. De authentieke zijwaartscrollende actie is bewaard gebleven, en toegevoegd zijn nieuwe rusting en voorwerpen die je vaardigheden verbeteren. Ben jij behendig genoeg om deze uitbraak te stoppen? Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

LT.name: Mega Man™ X3
LT.description: Just when it seemed like a cure for the Reploids had been found, suddenly the once-peaceful robots are turning back into rogue Mavericks. As Maverick Hunters, Mega Man X and Zero spring into action. Mega Man X3 is the final chapter of the series on Super Nintendo. LV.name: Mega Man™ X3
LV.description: Just when it seemed like a cure for the Reploids had been found, suddenly the once-peaceful robots are turning back into rogue Mavericks. As Maverick Hunters, Mega Man X and Zero spring into action. Mega Man X3 is the final chapter of the series on Super Nintendo. Play as Mega Man X or, for the first time, as Zero who has even more powerful weaponry. In addition to the classic run-and-gun gameplay, collect armour and new Enhancement Chips to upgrade your abilities further. Do you have the skills to fight this latest outbreak? This is the US version of the game.

MX.name: MEGA MAN X3
MX.description: Después de descubrir un virus que estaba convirtiendo a los pacíficos e inteligentes robots conocidos como Reploid en furiosos Maverick, el científico Dr. Doppler exitosamente crea un antivirus para solucionar el problema. Los Reploid reformados se mudan a Dopple Town, un lugar donde los humanos y los reploid viven juntos en armonía, pero cuando una epidemia causa que los Reploid se rebelen contra los Maverick, Mega Man X y Zero serán enviados a controlar la situación. Elige entre Mega Man X o Zero y corre, brinca, deslízate, escala paredes, evita obstáculos y pelea contra tus enemigos en ocho desafiantes etapas. Al final de cada etapa derrota al jefe para obtener un arma especial que te ayudará en las batallas subsecuentes. ¿Serás tú la cura para esta epidemia? Choose either Mega Man X or Zero as you run, jump, dash, scale walls, avoid obstacles, and fight enemies in eight challenging stages. At the end of each stage, defeat the boss to gain a special weapon that will aid you in the upcoming battles. Will you be the cure for this latest outbreak?

The reformed Reploids then move into Dopple Town, a place where humans and Reploids can live together in harmony. But when an outbreak occurs causing the Reploids to turn back into Mavericks, Maverick Hunters Mega Man X and Zero are sent to contain the situation. SK.name: Mega Man™ X3
SK.description: Just when it seemed like a cure for the Reploids had been found, suddenly the once-peaceful robots are turning back into rogue Mavericks. As Maverick Hunters, Mega Man X and Zero spring into action. Mega Man X3 is the final chapter of the series on Super Nintendo. Play as Mega Man X or, for the first time, as Zero who has even more powerful weaponry. In addition to the classic run-and-gun gameplay, collect armour and new Enhancement Chips to upgrade your abilities further. Do you have the skills to fight this latest outbreak? This is the US version of the game.

RU.name: Mega Man™ X3
RU.description: Казалось, лекарство для реплоидов найдено — но не тут-то было! Мирные роботы вновь стали обращаться в неуправляемых убийц Mavericks. Профессиональные охотники на Mavericks по имени Mega Man X и Zero вновь берутся за оружие. Mega Man X3 — последняя часть игровой серии для Super Nintendo. Впервые за всю серию вы можете играть как за Mega Man X, так и за Zero, оснащенного еще более мощным оружием. Игровой процесс не отличается от предыдущих игр (главный герой бегает и стреляет во врагов), но теперь вы можете собирать броню и усовершенствования, чтобы дополнительно развить способности персонажей. Хватит ли вам умения, чтобы прекратить эпидемию бешенства среди роботов? Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

SE.name: Mega Man™ X3
SE.description: Just when it seemed like a cure for the Reploids had been found, suddenly the once-peaceful robots are turning back into rogue Mavericks. As Maverick Hunters, Mega Man X and Zero spring into action. Mega Man X3 is the final chapter of the series on Super Nintendo. Play as Mega Man X or, for the first time, as Zero who has even more powerful weaponry. PT.name: Mega Man™ X3
PT.description: Precisamente quando se julgava ter encontrado a cura para os Reploids, estes começam a converter-se em rebeldes Mavericks. Como Maverick Hunters, Mega Man X e Zero têm que entrar em ação! Mega Man X3 é o último capítulo da saga para a Super Nintendo e introduz a possibilidade de controlar Zero, que dispõe de mais armas potentes, para além de Mega Man X. Salta e dispara, recolhe armamento e novos Enhancement Chips para melhorar ainda mais as tuas habilidades. Será que conseguirás acabar com esta nova ameaça? Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

PL.name: Mega Man™ X3
PL.description: Just when it seemed like a cure for the Reploids had been found, suddenly the once-peaceful robots are turning back into rogue Mavericks. As Maverick Hunters, Mega Man X and Zero spring into action. Mega Man X3 is the final chapter of the series on Super Nintendo. Play as Mega Man X or, for the first time, as Zero who has even more powerful weaponry. In addition to the classic run-and-gun gameplay, collect armour and new Enhancement Chips to upgrade your abilities further. Do you have the skills to fight this latest outbreak? This is the US version of the game.

HR.name: Mega Man™ X3
HR.description: Just when it seemed like a cure for the Reploids had been found, suddenly the once-peaceful robots are turning back into rogue Mavericks. As Maverick Hunters, Mega Man X and Zero spring into action. Mega Man X3 is the final chapter of the series on Super Nintendo. Play as Mega Man X or, for the first time, as Zero who has even more powerful weaponry. In addition to the classic run-and-gun gameplay, collect armour and new Enhancement Chips to upgrade your abilities further. Do you have the skills to fight this latest outbreak? This is the US version of the game.

IT.name: Mega Man™ X3
IT.description: Proprio quando sembrava che un ingegnoso espediente avesse fermato la minaccia dei Reploid, questi robot un tempo pacifici si trasformano nuovamente in pericolosi Maverick. È il momento che Mega Man X e Zero entrino in azione: alla caccia dei ribelli! Mega Man X3 è il capitolo finale della saga per Super Nintendo e introduce la possibilità di giocare per la prima volta non solo nei panni di Mega Man X, ma anche di Zero, con tutto il suo arsenale di armi ancora più potenti. Fatti strada saltando e sparando ai nemici, inoltre raccogli le parti dell'armatura e inediti chip di potenziamento per migliorare le tue abilità. Hai la stoffa per vincere anche l'ultima battaglia? Questa è la versione americana del gioco.
